title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 121.2 - Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 121.2 - Regulations

State Regulations

These regulations are established by the Commissioner of

Motor Vehicles and govern the operation of the Traffic Violations Bureau, the
agency created to assume jurisdiction over traffic infractions. The infractions
are civil in nature, and proceedings before the bureau are not subject to
requirements of the Criminal Procedure Law. The bureau will operate in those
jurisdictions authorized by the Legislature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
121.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
